DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose test community-developed target intervention employ community health worker ( CHWs ) aid newly Medicaid-insured woman . These woman face challenge engage healthcare health make highly personal socioculturally embed decision reproductive health-related preventive service ( e.g. , contraception , STI cancer screen ) .
DOC.detailed_description: All newly enrol woman one Arizona 's state-wide Medicaid health plan ( University Family Care ) ambulatory community-dwelling , age 18-39 , identify health plan monthly basis eligible study . For least first month , new health plan member randomize 2 1 ( intervention usual care control ) . Each month health plan provide study team number new member . A study team member provide health plan list number ( 1 's 0 's ) generate use biased coin design apply new member . To avoid bias , health plan staff aware member study arm . All new health plan enrollees ( per current standard health plan practice ) receive series welcome communication ( mail electronically ) health plan shortly enrollment . These design apprise new member health plan policy procedure relate covered benefit , facilitate selection primary care provider , provide general preventive health resource information . This follow second mail 3-months post enrollment , well nurse follow-up call . The latter design answer question cover service , find primary care provider , and/or otherwise provide support . Both intervention control group member receive identical communication health plan point . Potential participant contact health plan 's call center . A brief verbal overview intervention include time requirement content cover provide . The potential participant randomly assign intervention group offer opportunity set individual confidential appointment community health worker ( CHW ) early convenience . The call center provide research office list interested participant contact information . Once list receive research office , CHW assign potential participant . The assigned CHW call introduce , answer linger question intervention propose encounter confirm participant 's acceptance intervention . At time , CHW confirm language location preference , date/ time propose meeting , contact information research office question . The CHW meet subject complete inform consent process . Also , baseline inform patient choice survey perform use touch tablet device ( ascertain baseline knowledge , patient preference , inform decision making , health literacy ) . The CHW tailor individual education session meet unique need participant ( e.g. , individual discloses history surgical sterilization receive information contraception ) . The 45-minute intervention deliver describe . The patient ask personally assess need regard reproductive health-related issue . The CHW work participant develop personalized plan access relevant target preventive service . This may involve assistance contact Health Plan assistance identify make appointment primary care provider . At conclusion intervention , patient encourage reach CHW telephone electronically subsequent question concern , appointment two booster telephone call schedule . Finally , consideration time participation , participant provide $ 40 gift card . Booster telephone support call occur 2 4 month post intervention . A telephone call guide use reinforce clarify key concept initial intervention encounter well help client formulate relevant question relate specific woman 's preventive service health concern anticipation next primary care provider ( PCP ) visit . Participants also query specifically issue relate interaction health plan and/or contact primary care provider . The patient assist connect health plan PCP 's office issue easily address CHW . Whenever possible , every effort make CHW connect patient appropriate outreach staff PCP 's office ( staff available ) . Again availability CHW telephone electronically interval question emphasize . At month 6 , participant receive call telephone interviewer administer 6-month informed patient choice survey identical survey complete baseline . A $ 40 gift card incentive offer complete survey .
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 39 Women newly enrol one statewide Medicaid health plan ( University Family Care ) Women ambulatory Women communitydwelling Women age 18 39 Women newly enrol one state wide Medicaid health plan ( University Family Care ) Women ambulatory Women community dwell
